name: Disney Challenge 4 Quiz | Movie Mixture | 25 Questions

questions.text: Which Disney film features the song 'When You Wish Upon a Star'?
What is the name of the English captain that Pocahontas falls in love with?
Which city is the home of the Darling family in Peter Pan?
Which Disney film contains a song which has the lyrics 'We are Siamese if you please' from 'The Siamese Cat Song'?
Which Disney film features 'The Unbirthday Song'?
options: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.text: The song, 'Oh Sing, Sweet Nightingale' features in which Disney film?
What is the occupation of Roger in '101 Dalmatians'?
In 'The Aristocats', Duchess and her three kittens are abandoned in the countryside by a jealous butler. Which city is home to Duchess and her heirs to a great fortune?
Who has animal friends called Jaq and Gus the mice, the bluebirds and Bruno the dog?
Which Disney film features the song 'Sister Suffragette'?
questions.explanation:
Mary Poppins.

	Mrs. Banks (Glynis Johns) sings the amusing Suffragette song.

questions.text: What is the occupation of Cruella De Vil in '101 Dalmatians'?
What is the name of the cat in 'Cinderella'?
In which Disney film do we meet a female deer called Faline?
options: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.text: What are the names of the twin sisters in 'The Parent Trap' (1998)?
In 'Fantasia', who does Mickey Mouse as the Sorcerer's Apprentice, teach to do his work?
In which Disney film is there a Magic Mirror?
questions.correct: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
questions.explanation: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.

questions.text: Princess Tiger Lily appears in which Disney film?
questions.explanation:
Peter Pan.

	Captain Hook kidnaps the Indian maiden in the hope of luring Peter Pan.

questions.text: In 'Robin Hood', what animals play Robin Hood and Maid Marian?
In 'The Rescuers', what is the name of the albatross who operates an air-carrier service?
In 'The Sword in the Stone', what is the name of the boy-king who becomes King Arthur, whose mentor is an owl called Archimedes?
Joe Carioca, Panchito and ... are 'The Three Caballeros'?
What is the name of the evil witch in 'Sleeping Beauty'?
In '101 Dalmatians', when Pongo and Perdita's puppies arrive, which puppy appears not to survive until Roger massages the infant pup's heart hence stirring it back to life?
In 'Mary Poppins', what is the name of Mary's uncle who rises to the ceiling every time he starts to laugh?
In 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs', name the wicked Queen's Huntsman?
questions.explanation:
Humbert.

	Hope you enjoyed the quiz and didn't cheat by asking the kids.
